Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Masculinity \Mas`cu*lin"i*ty\, n. The state or quality of being masculine; masculineness. [1913 Webster]
masculinity n 1: the properties characteristic of the male sex [syn: {maleness}] [ant: {femaleness}] 2: the trait of behaving in ways considered typical for men [ant: {femininity}]
